text:
I have know about Ruby for over 20 years; my former law Partner, Tatum S. Hilmoe has been with Ruby since he passed the Cal State Bar. 

All the people I have spoken to at Ruby are regular people with a sense of humor--not stuffed shirts. I have worked at law firms my whole life; I have enough stuffed shirts to last a lifetime.
author: Ray Marrero

text: I received an alert that our account was nearing it's limit for coverage.  I called to talk with a representative, and I was able to speak to someone immediately who reviewed our account and provided great advice.  I really appreciated the quick response and easy solutions!
author: Michelle

text:
We just started service and have already received several complements on the operators professionalism and eagerness to help the callers. This reflects well on Ruby's internal processes and employee training programs.

Also, the sales and onboarding was seamless. Louis is a fantastic account manager, excellent communication and expectation setting.
author: Spencer Norris

text: Ruby is such a wonderful tool with EXCELLENT customer service for your company! Everyone is always very kind, follow up is excellent and I can rest easy knowing they are handling our phone calls. Bri helped me out with going over our minutes being used and definitely help me understand what plan we should use. Not only was that great, she said she’d follow up with me in a week…and she did! It’s hard sometimes to get people to actually follow up, so excellent work Bri!
author: Melissa Burkholder

text: I was given an excellent evaluation of my current program, made suggestions I had not thought of to improve it.  Just a super review toward costing me less money, not more.
author: Bruce Stratton

text: From the introduction with Christina Urban and the onboarding with Nicholas Fox everything was perfect and seamless! Both were equally professional and knowledgeable on the product and my needs. Very friendly and thorough. I left both meetings feeling great about my choice.
author: LaTonya W

text:
Tyrese G went the extra mile for us and answered a customer's query for us. 
I deeply appreciate the customer service!
author: Shari

text: I was blown away by the lengthy, articulate and expansively descriptive email response Ruby sent me regarding assessment of the intake calls process.  Not only was it thoughtful and thorough, but they are more than willing to troubleshoot how to gauge certain types of service calls to be handled differently than other types. Mind you, their 3 months in review of service have already been absolutely AMAZING!  We work in a very unique industry and the refinement I am asking for is high maintenance to a degree.  Though it is necessary for resource optimization as well as prioritizing some clients ahead of others.  Notwithstanding, there is not an easy fix.  They couldn’t be more game for the brainstorming.  It is that type of high level customer service separating them from their competitors. Thank you again Ruby for the winner mentality, look forward to taking your good service to great and even better!
author: Jordan Scherer

text: Amber was friendly when I returned the call to Ruby's Answering Service. I know that she treats my clients and potential clients politely, is helpful, speaks clearly and is very friendly.  Just as if we had someone at our front desk!  I'm glad to have this service available when our office doesn't have a staff member at the phones.
author: Mary Lawler

text: Taylor Caraher responded promptly with my request and well as provided a details on what was done as well as shared additional information which was very helpful and beneficial. Thank you!
author: Melanie Rivera

text: Tyler provided amazing service, clear communication, and all I needed to know about porting all our phones over to Ruby.   So appreciative of Ruby's live support!
author: Cathi

text: Tyler was an absolute pleasure to deal with on the phone this morning and helped answer all of my questions and concerns.
author: Christine

text: Ruby gives us exactly what we need as a new business with limited staff.  It provides a professional experience for our clients while minimizing the hours needed to man a reception desk.
author: Lyssa King

text: Game changer! I never realized how many calls we get a day that are not productive for our business and Ruby has been able to stop a lot of that.
author: Chuck Justus

text: Ruby has been so helpful to our small law firm. Their services ensure that our clients always get a live person to talk to and schedule appointments. It makes it easier for the support staff to take time off when we need and know that the business is still covered.
author: Jennifer Lange Schneider

text:
Ruby is the best vendor decision our law firm has made this year! 

When our previous call center was costing us valuable potential cases compared to the "value" pricing of their service, we took a leap of faith and signed on with Ruby. 

And Ruby has already proved the ol' adage "you get what you pay for!" Ruby agents handle calls with such professionalism and care that there are times their process even exceeds my expectations! I am beyond grateful that we made the switch! 

They are easy to work with, quick to respond, and great with communication and data gathering. They match our values of treating every call with kindness and patience. 

We are so happy to have found Ruby!
author: Diane Belmont

text: We have used Ruby for many years and are completely happy with the service. The receptionists are always friendly to our callers and handle them effectively. The administration of the service solves problems and answers questions quickly and with a smile.
author: Allison Dampier

text: I gave up a receptionist/clerk and moved my practice to my home.  Ruby is my window to the world and it has been great.  Immediate service, immediate contact with new clients and always courteous to me & my clientele.  Best choice made in my career!!!
author: Antonio Bestard

text: We have been using Ruby Receptionist for a few months and we are happy with the service so far! We appreciate the peace of mind we get with Ruby Receptionists answering our calls, getting them to the right person, taking informative messages for us, and filtering out robo calls too! There is a learning curve in the beginning but well worth it!
author: US Custom Creations

text: Our small law firm is currently looking for a new admin employee/ receptionist, and in the meantime, our attorneys were taking all of the cold calls on our main line.  Signing up for Ruby allowed us to weed out spam, marketing, and robo calls without taking up any of our professional's time, and helped us to narrow down good potential leads from those that weren't right for our firm.  This has freed up more valuable time than we could have expected. We are thrilled with Ruby's results.
author: D Fairchild

text: Exceptional service by an excellent team. The Ruby app is also exceptional. Calls are transcribed in a timely fashion. I am very happy with Ruby team!
author: susan uyanna

text: It's super easy to work with Ruby! They are flexible and help you on your terms. By having Ruby in place, they help me to connect to potential clients faster.
author: SC Travel Advisor

text: They provided a professional well trained extension of us to ensure that we do not miss any calls from existing clients, partners and potential new clients.   Saves us from missing incoming calls.
author: Scott Cornell

text: Jessica Pacheco made the experience of signing up an easy one. Not to mention her personality! She made it fun. As someone who is just beginning his business, there are many uncertainties. One thing that IS certain, is my choice to start with PATLive. Thanks for answering all of my questions, Jess.
author: Timothy Hopwood

text:
From the very beginning, I felt the support, empathy, and kindness of the team. This was my first time using this type of service, and I was completely lost about how the process worked. However, they truly made me feel guided every step of the way. It felt as if they held my hand and patiently walked me through the entire process with professionalism, care, and genuine dedication.

I am extremely happy that I chose this company. They made me feel valued and truly special. Thank you!

Jorge U.
author: Jorge Urquizo Torquemada

text:
Professional and Kind Service:

I would like to acknowledge Matthew Garcia for his professionalism, genuine cared to customer service, as well as his knowledge.

Thank you
author: Dr. Amalia Humada-Ludeke

text: Patlive provides a great service for our 3 companies. Their attention to detail is very important and much appreciated!!
author: Luann

text: PatLive is Awesome, I love the consistent professionalism with which the receptionist answer the calls and Amy's attention to detail is very impressive!
author: Tanya Kelly

text: We have been with PATLIVE for a month now and so far, so good. Matthew Garcia & Jessica were great to work with. Great customer service!
author: Angela Roseo

text: We are brand new and still in the beginning stages of using PATLive. There’s a lot to learn still for us, but I have loved working with Amy Hearn this far. She is knowledgeable and helpful. When I ask for her suggestions on what she has seen success with in the past, she gives great advice. She is quick to respond and I look forward to a long lasting relationship with PATlive and Amy!
author: Nicole Thibodeau

text: Jessica really took the extra step and time to make sure I am all set for my business need with Patlive services. Thank you!
author: Michael Yanahan

text:
I just wanted to share my experience with PATLive after finding them in the App Marketplace for Jobber. I gave them a call and chatted with Jessica Pacheco about what I needed. We dove into some challenges I was facing with my old call center, and let me tell you, Jessica was super helpful! She hooked me up with an onboarding session with Amy Hearn for a 14-day free trial. Amy laid out the onboarding process for me and promised she’d be there until everything was running smoothly.

I had been with another call center for years, but Amy and Jessica had a totally different vibe when it came to meeting my business needs. My previous rep was nice, but it always felt like I was hitting a wall with, "We can't do that for your company." I was expected to just go along with their way of doing things. But with Amy and Jessica, they made it clear they had solutions for my past issues and were totally open to CUSTOMIZING how my calls were handled.

Now, PATLive answers 100% of my calls, and based on my custom setup, they can schedule, forward, mark as spam, or enter leads into my system. Plus, they’ve got this handy app that lets me monitor calls and sends me text and email alerts. If I ever have questions or concerns, Amy or any of my PATLive agents are always ready to help out! Honestly, there was no need for a 14-day trial to convince me—PATLive won me over from Day One!
author: James Cayton

text:
I wanted to express my sincere appreciation for the exceptional work of the ladies who handle incoming calls. My review of calls for my business revealed consistent professionalism, even when faced with rude and disrespectful callers. Their handling was commendable, far exceeding how I would have responded.

Additionally, my onboarding specialist, Amy Hearn, provided the perfect balance of compassion and professionalism, making me feel welcomed and supported. She was always available to answer questions and guide me through the onboarding process.

Thank you for providing such outstanding service.

Sincerely,
Darrel Bish
author: Darrel Bish

text: So far our experience has been great. Jessica Pacheco has been a pleasure to work with and knows the product and the process extremely well. She and her experience and knowledge is what closed the deal. I look forward to using the service and hope that this trend continues with the rest of the team.
author: Julie Hinman

text: As always, PATLive never fails to provide the excellence of human touch, and the quality of technical expertise. Jessica Pacheco did a fantastic job re-enrolling our office in Pat's Live Answering Service. PATLive is the only way to go with either automated or live phone-answering.
author: Gurutrang Singh Khalsa

text: I had a fantastic onboarding experience, thanks to Jessica. She was incredibly knowledgeable and made the entire process seamless. Her expertise made it easy for me to sign up, and her customer service was top-notch. I’m looking forward to using the product and can’t recommend the straightforward and smooth onboarding process highly enough!
author: Shari Thompson

text: This morning, I had the pleasure of speaking with Jessica P., a representative from PATLive, about the onboarding process. It was, without a doubt, one of the best customer service experiences I’ve had in a long time. Jessica was incredibly informative, highly professional, and guided me seamlessly through the process. She also shared additional insights that made signing up with PATLive an easy and obvious decision. I truly wish every company had dedicated professionals like Jessica on their team.
author: E Rivero

text: Just signed up today so I don't have any input on how the service will be going forward. However so far so good! Jess was my initial contact and I was super happy with the level of service she provided. She was very informative and knowledgable regarding the platform. Jess took the time to answer all my questions and I never felt rushed which is important to me. I actually had two other calls scheduled today with competitors but decided to sign up with Pat Live because of the way I was treated by Jess. She is definitely an asset to Pat Live's team
author: Angelo Ponce

text: I spoke with McKenna who called me in the promised time frame. She was so patient and informative.  Definitely a 5-star onboarding experience so far.
author: Conrad Meertins

text: We were referred to PATLive by our digital marketing agency as a suggestion to make our firm available to potential clients any time of day. When we realized that they could also help during holidays and times when we have offsite office training it felt like a no-brainer to enroll in the free trial period. Amy Hearn was our on-boarding specialist and was wonderful through the whole set-up process & trial period. She explained everything we needed to know and was quick to answer any questions we had. When testing the call service operators each experience was positive and professional. Now we are past the on-boarding period and rely on daily message logs and their normal Customer Service Team which have also proven to be just as responsive. If you are on the fence about trying a call service, go to their website and read about all the services they offer, then just do it and give PATLive a try!
author: Kara Huesman

text: I had a different answering service for our business before coming to PATLive and was completely unsatisfied with them. PATLive has been so easy to work with. Our Onboarding Specialist, Matthew, has been great in getting all the information needed for our company. I love the way that PATLive operates and has been able to integrate into our Jobber software. It really gives me the downtime needed but also pease of knowing all of our customers are still being taken care of!
author: Gabrielle D'Auria

text:
Amy Hearn came in on her morning off to help me get set up with Pat Live. Their service is legendary in the real estate investing industry and going above and beyond is what this Company and their remarkable employees do. 
 The corporate world should take a lesson from these folks!!
 Thank You Amy, 
Dan Weiman
author: Dan Weiman

text: We have tried 4 other virtual receptionist companies prior to finding PatLive and none of them provided the professional support we were looking for like PatLive has.  Their receptionists are courteous & professional, and do not waste our minutes taking too long to provide our callers with service.  I would highly recommend them.
author: Value Capital Funding

text: Representative AMY was Attentive, Pleasent, Very Informative, and answered all my questions satisfactorily. Lastly she explained all thoroughly.!!
author: James

text: We had an onboarding process of one month with an assigned personal coach, Matt, helping us with any questions and problems. Matt did a great job setting up quickly our service and adjusted it several times to meet our needs. We highly recommend PATlive!
author: Ellie Chuparova

text: I’ve used PATLive for a few years and I’ve always had a great experience. Their customer service and onboarding is great, as is the quality of the service they offer. Would always recommend to anyone who needs a similar service for their business.
author: Andy

text: Good service, fair pricing and cancellation conditions and very friendly people! What a great experience. :-)
author: Yvonne Simon

text: Great service and great pricing for my business needs.The on boarding specialist was very knowledgeable in the products they offer and great giving me feedback on what would work for my business model.
author: Dennis Lewis jr

text: PATLive provided superior service and support throughout my time using them. I'm extremely happy with them.
author: Troy Corupe

text:
PATLive is a Great Call Center/Receptionist company. They take all kinds of calls and allow me to be able to run my business without having to worry about the phone. 

They are able to integrate with my CRM to be able to track the calls easily and have all the data that i need readily available to return the calls with all the info that I need to have a good conversation. 

If you company get spam calls or hate calls, this is a great service to be able to weed out these calls and only talk to the people who are actually interested in working with you.
author: Michael Bishop

text: Darla was excellent. Very easy to work with and knows the system along with the neuropathy space very well. She was able to advise us along with work within our parameters to make Pat Live work well for us and improve the experience right away so that it would work for us.
author: Trish

text: Matthew helped me getting my script formatted and uploaded into their system. I was provided a number that turned out to have a lot of spam/hang up calls. Matthew troubleshoot the issue and provide me a new number. No issues since then. Great team and they really listen to your feedback and help with any issues. Thank you!
author: Jo Morais

text: Great service! Darla was extremely helpful and professional with our on boarding. This has been a game changer for our company!
author: Blake Hawkins

text: Darla is amazing over at Pat live and has helped me tremendously and quickly. Would recommend highly.
author: Ronak Dalal

text: My onboarding specialist was very knowledgeable and helped me out with any questions I had. I would highly recommend this to someone. I’m looking forward to continuing using this service
author: Collin Miles

text: I tried another service (SAS) and while I was in their free trial period, I had such a bad experience that I switched to PATLive. I felt like my rep, Darla, cared about my business and wanted to make sure I felt like my company was in good hands. PATLive was a little more expensive, but I feel like SAS would have cost me more due to the quality of service. I highly recommend this company.
author: AuctionVcommerce LLC

text: Darla provided excellent onboarding experience and followed through on communication every single time. Thank you for the great service!
author: Natasha

text: I just switched from another call answering service to PatLive and had a great experience! I worked with Matthew Garcia who is super personable, professional, and knowledgeable about the services that PatLive offers. Additionally PatLive is much more flexible and accommodating in terms of the scenarios they can handle. Based on my experience so far I can very highly recommend both Matthew and PatLive!
author: Stacey

text: We're new to PatLive and the onboarding team was great! Everyone is extremely competent which makes us confident that our answering service needs are in good hands.
author: Joe Gerbino

text:
PatLive is a wonderful alternative to an "in person" receptionist.  The onboarding process has been a breeze and every team member is so helpful.  

I highly suggest using PatLive!
author: Beth Tessandori

text: Matthew Garcia , and the team were prompt, reliable, and effective.Simplicity at its finest I really appreciate you guys alot thanks!!!!
author: Clarence Brown

text:
Matthew Garcia made the onboarding process very simple. Matthew is very thorough and communicated well the options available to make our employees daily workload more manageable without answering phones. I appreciated the follow-ups and check-in during the initial 30 days of service and after.
When going over the script it helped to have someone with experience to give suggestions as to how the agents would handle the calls specific to the nature of our business. THANKS Matthew!

Overall, our experience has been great thus far, a very simple and straight forward set-up which made the process at ease. 

I would reccomend others to receiving services.
author: Rushonna Carter

text: Darla is FANTASTIC! She made the process easy and painless. This was a great decision for 2021. I would highly recommend this to anyone.
author: The Lot Bank Co

text: My company has had a great experience with PATLive so far. Matthew Garcia, our onboarding specialist is amazing. Always prompt with responses and takes action fast. He looks out for the best interest of our company and makes it a point to resolve problems quickly. Overall, I am satisfied with them.
author: Trudy Tetteh

text: Hi, I would like to give great feedback to one of  your customer service agents. We had a billing concern that needed to be fixed and I was so pleased to have Edith help me with it.  She was very familiar with how our situation worked, explained what would happen, and what she was doing to correct it. I asked her if she wouldn't mind following our case to make sure everything processed correctly and she was glad to do that for me.  Kudos to Edith!!!
author: Amy Rowe

text: Hi World! If you want a professional call answering service that goes ABOVE AND BEYOND and delivers incredible product, incredible service, and incredible responsivness to customer needs...then PATLIVE is the place. I have been blown away with how wonderful Patlive has been for our business! Thank you PATLive! Keep up the great work!
author: Jared Goldfarb

text:
PatLive has been our partner for over 3 years now.  They handle all Work Order calls 24/7 for our 40+ properties.
PatLive has averaged over 25,000 work orders entered into our system in real time per year, and handled thousand of additional calls for follow up.   PatLives's  responsiveness and customer service has been excellent.
During the Pandemic they have not missed a beat and continued to service our customers/residents well.  Their adoption in using our work order system and using our on-call system for emergencies has been excellent and reduced additional damages to units.
If there is an issue they are quick to remedy with additional training, process or script changes.  PatLive is a valued and trusted partner of the Blue Horizon Management Company (BHMC), a subsidiary of INLIVIAN (formally the Charlotte Housing Authority)
Kenneth O Wood
EVP Information Technology
INLIVIAN
author: Kenneth Wood

text: We have been through 5 or 6 call answering services over the years, and Abby Connect has been the best by a long shot. I appreciate that they are quick to respond and they've been willing to explore complex technical configurations with me. I've really appreciated our working relationship and highly recommend them to any business looking for high quality phone answering services. Special shout outs to Kat Currah and Priscilla Loza on the Abby Connect team! :-)
author: Brandon

text: We’ve had a great experience with Abby Connect. Their live receptionists are professional, reliable, and make a strong first impression with our clients. A big part of our success has been our dedicated Client Success Manager, Priscilla L., who is responsive and proactive about quality control. Whenever an issue comes up, she helps identify it quickly and works with us to fine-tune the service so our customer experience keeps improving. Highly recommend.
author: THE LAW OFFICES OF SHAWN B HAMP PC

text: Priscilla from Abby Connect did a great job updating our call handling when a staff member left. She quickly assessed prior data and presented a solution to the problem.
author: Jennifer

text: The firm I work for uses Abby Connect for our overflow and after hours calls.  From the very beginning they have been great to work with.  My Sr CSM Angelica (Angie) Monterossa is wonderful.  She is professional, kind and quick to respond.  I value the supportive relationship that we have and would highly recommend them!
author: Rebecca

text: Working with Angelica has been great. She has been on point since she took over our account. Great communication and always there to help when we need it. Thank you so much Angie!!
author: Zane Fetter

text: Great company. We've worked with Abby Connect for years now and anytime we've ever needed any help, they have been incredibly responsive and friendly. Just today I was having some trouble viewing our account settings and Priscilla was able to quickly help me out with portal access. Great customer service.
author: Grace

text:
Abby Connect has been a game changer for our granite countertop business.

Their team handles every call professionally and makes sure we never miss an opportunity.

Priscilla Loza, our Client Success Manager, has been outstanding to work with. She's always quick to respond, helpful with any questions, and genuinely cares about making sure the service works seamlessly for our business.

I highly recommend Abby Connect. They've earned our trust, and we're grateful for the peace of mind they provide.
author: Alberto Martinez

text:
Abby Connect has been an amazing addition to our business.  We first started using Abby during the Covid pandemic when our own staff was stressed, overworked and needed some help with the volume of phone calls we were receiving.  The Abby team quickly learned the unique needs of our business and five years later we are still happy with their service.  Our business receives calls 24/7, and even in the middle of the night the receptionists are kind and helpful.
Over the past several months Pricilla has been the one to answer almost every email I have sent, responding within a short time with concise information and confirmations of our changes.
I would recommend Abby to anyone who wants to take some of the load off of their administrative team.

Sincerely,
Tori Allen
Operations Manager
Frye Chapel Mortuary & Crematory
author: Tori Allen

text: We've used Abby Connect for about 3 years now and have ZERO complaints! Priscilla Loza, Angelica Monterrosa and the rest of the team over there have been amazing. 10 out of 10 recommend.
author: Trilogy Fertilization & Weed C

text: We have been using Abby for about a month, and the quality of the AI receptionist is very good. It took us some time to populate the Q&A for the AI training, but the Abby team stepped up and helped us get everything in place. After starting they have also been very responsive in helping fine tune and solve minor problems.
author: Sergio Ruffolo

text: We have had Abby for a long time now. They help so much to sort our incoming calls. They are attentive and respond to our questions and concerns quickly. Every once in a while they may not get the name of the client that is calling correct, but it is nothing that we cant quickly figure out. Mostly they do a great job answering clients and transferring them to where they need to go byt asking the correct questions.
author: Heather Gehl

text: I have been with Abby for over 3 years. They have provided a first-class and professional image for many customers. If there is ever an issue, Angie is always responsive and helpful! I absolutely love this service!
author: Annie Bailey

text: I can’t express how happy I am with their team. From Angelica my account manager to the receptionists they are nothing but professional. Always helping me increase my conversions. I’ve tried 3 other services and they are by far the best.
author: Chip Holmes

text: Abby always strives to do what is best for the client and their clients.  The communication line to Abby's management team is very fluid, and changes are met with enthusiasm.  They are quite accurate in directing the caller to the correct contact who can help.
author: James Simpson

text: Our company has been utilizing an answering service since 2010 which has transformed the way we do business. I am SO happy to have found Abby Connect. They are hands down the best answering service I have ever worked with. My account manager Angie is always there to update any last minute changes whether it be for holiday hours or unexpected staff absences. She always gets back to me in a timely manner and makes sure all of our calls are answered professionally. Many of our clients are shocked to find out they even spoke to an answering service because of how well they answer our clients calls and questions. We couldn't imagine doing business without their assistance. They are truly part of our team and help us provide great service to our clients.
author: Sounds Incredible Mobile

text: I have been using Abby for over a year now to handle all of my appointment scheduling.  I tried other companies first, and Abby has made it the easiest.  Their call centers are in Las Vegas, so there is no language issue when they handle your calls.  My CSM on my account, Jovan, has been the literal best.
author: Chelsea Woodworth

text: We partnered with Wing Assistant to provide customer service coverage for our non-business hours.  We needed coverage from 4:30 pm to 8:00 am M-F and 24-hour coverage on the weekends.  Our Wing teammates provided this coverage without any interruption to support our basic business functions.  They easily integrated into our tech stack making communication with our Wing teammates seamless.  They did a tremendous job of supporting our customers and prospects throughout the entire partnership.
author: Keith Hartman

text: Wing Assistant has been an absolute lifesaver. They matched me with a virtual assistant who is professional, reliable, incredibly dedicated, and genuinely competent. She doesn’t just complete tasks—she owns them. My workweek is smoother, more focused, and far more productive because of her. I honestly can’t imagine operating without her at this point. If you’re on the fence about a VA, Wing makes the decision easy.
author: Kevin Gallemore

text: Working with Wing Assistant has been an amazing experience.  I use them for VAs for our Real Estate companies and they have become valued parts of our team.  They do a great job matching you with the right team members and I was surprised how quickly they learned our systems.  I will be using them more and more as our company grows!
author: GSB

text: Overall, my experience with Wing has been wonderful.  I have recommended Wing to multiple contacts of mine looking for virtual assistant services, and my company has since onboarded additional Virtual Assistants since we initially began working with Wing.  The assistant that I specifically work with, Anne, is absolutely incredible.  She is a joy to work with, communicates effectively and proactively, and has helped make our tasks more efficient and productive.
author: Marysa Cohen

text: Excellent service. Wing cares about their clients and they always seek providing me the best optimal solution.
author: idan goren
